Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Geez \Geez\, n. The original native name for the ancient Ethiopic language or people. See {Ethiopic}. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ethiopic \E`thi*op"ic\, n. The language of ancient Ethiopia; the language of the ancient Abyssinian empire (in Ethiopia), now used only in the Abyssinian church. It is of Semitic origin, and is also called {Geez}. [1913 Webster]
